languages.text: [Обратиться к отряду Соломона] "Арбитры, я ожидаю, что каждый еретик на этом корабле познает неумолимость правосудия. Сегодня сам Император внимает вашим приговорам — так несите же врагам смерть!"

[Address Solomorne's squad] "Arbitrators, I expect every heretic on this ship to come to know the implacability of justice. Today, the Emperor Himself heeds your verdicts — so go and deliver death unto the enemy!"
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к отряду Соломона] "Арбитры, я ожидаю, что каждый еретик на этом корабле познает неумолимость правосудия. Сегодня сам Император внимает вашим приговорам — так несите же врагам смерть!"

[Address Solomorne's squad] "Arbitrators, I expect every heretic on this ship to come to know the implacability of justice. Today, the Emperor Himself heeds your verdicts — so go and deliver death unto the enemy!"

languages.text: [Solomornes Trupp ansprechen] "Arbitratoren, ich erwarte, dass jeder Ketzer auf diesem Schiff die Unerbittlichkeit des Gesetzes kennenlernt. Heute hört der Imperator selbst Eure Urteile – also geht und bringt Tod über den Feind!"
languages.original_text: [Address Solomorne's squad] "Arbitrators, I expect every heretic on this ship to come to know the implacability of justice. Today, the Emperor Himself heeds your verdicts — so go and deliver death unto the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: [Solomornes Trupp ansprechen] "Arbitratoren, ich erwarte, dass jeder Ketzer auf diesem Schiff die Unerbittlichkeit des Gesetzes kennenlernt. Heute hört der Imperator selbst Eure Urteile – also geht und bringt Tod über den Feind!"

languages.text: [S'adresser à l'escouade de Solomorne] « Arbitrators, chaque hérétique à bord de ce vaisseau goûtera à la justice la plus implacable. L'Empereur lui-même écoute vos verdicts. Allez semer la mort parmi les rangs ennemis ! »
languages.original_text: [Address Solomorne's squad] "Arbitrators, I expect every heretic on this ship to come to know the implacability of justice. Today, the Emperor Himself heeds your verdicts — so go and deliver death unto the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: [S'adresser à l'escouade de Solomorne] « Arbitrators, chaque hérétique à bord de ce vaisseau goûtera à la justice la plus implacable. L'Empereur lui-même écoute vos verdicts. Allez semer la mort parmi les rangs ennemis ! »

languages.text: [对索罗蒙的小队开口]“全体法务官，我希望这艘船上的每个异端分子都能亲身感受无情的正义。今天，帝皇本人会亲自聆听你们的审判！前进吧，将敌人统统处决！”
languages.original_text: [Address Solomorne's squad] "Arbitrators, I expect every heretic on this ship to come to know the implacability of justice. Today, the Emperor Himself heeds your verdicts — so go and deliver death unto the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: [对索罗蒙的小队开口]“全体法务官，我希望这艘船上的每个异端分子都能亲身感受无情的正义。今天，帝皇本人会亲自聆听你们的审判！前进吧，将敌人统统处决！”

languages.text: [Dirigirte al escuadrón de Solomorne] «Arbitrator, espero que todos los herejes de esta nave descubran hoy la implacabilidad de la justicia. Hoy, el Emperador en persona escucha sus veredictos. ¡Marchen y den muerte al enemigo!».
languages.original_text: [Address Solomorne's squad] "Arbitrators, I expect every heretic on this ship to come to know the implacability of justice. Today, the Emperor Himself heeds your verdicts — so go and deliver death unto the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte al escuadrón de Solomorne] «Arbitrator, espero que todos los herejes de esta nave descubran hoy la implacabilidad de la justicia. Hoy, el Emperador en persona escucha sus veredictos. ¡Marchen y den muerte al enemigo!».

languages.text: [ソロモーンの部隊に呼びかける]「アービトレイターたちよ。この船にいるすべての異端者に、正義の容赦なさを思い知らせてやれ。今日は皇帝陛下ご自身が、諸君の判決に耳を傾けておられる。だから行け、敵に死をもたらせ！」
languages.original_text: [Address Solomorne's squad] "Arbitrators, I expect every heretic on this ship to come to know the implacability of justice. Today, the Emperor Himself heeds your verdicts — so go and deliver death unto the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: [ソロモーンの部隊に呼びかける]「アービトレイターたちよ。この船にいるすべての異端者に、正義の容赦なさを思い知らせてやれ。今日は皇帝陛下ご自身が、諸君の判決に耳を傾けておられる。だから行け、敵に死をもたらせ！」

languages.text: [Solomorne'un mangasına seslen] "Yargıcılar, bu gemideki her bir kâfire adaletin acımasızlığını göstermenizi istiyorum. Bugün İmparator Hazretleri, her bir hükmünüzde sizi izliyor olacak. Gidin ve düşmana ölüm saçın!"
languages.original_text: [Address Solomorne's squad] "Arbitrators, I expect every heretic on this ship to come to know the implacability of justice. Today, the Emperor Himself heeds your verdicts — so go and deliver death unto the enemy!"

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne'un mangasına seslen] "Yargıcılar, bu gemideki her bir kâfire adaletin acımasızlığını göstermenizi istiyorum. Bugün İmparator Hazretleri her bir hükmünüzde sizi izliyor olacak. Öyleyse gidin ve düşmana ölüm saçın!"
